name: Price Group Code
description: the fourth level in the Rockwell Automation material pricing hierarchy, which represents the amount of a discount off of list price to be applied to a specific group of Catalog Identifiers (such as 194, which represents ""700-HA: Tube Base"") for aggressive negotiations, stored as a nvarchar
The pricing hierarchy ensures consistent standard pricing and discount levels in the marketplace for similar products or services, and has the structure:
